text:
I am trying to set the aspect ratio in a plot recipe with the following
```scatter!(sc, grid, color=color, markersize=sc.size, axis=(autolimitaspect = 1,))```
When I try to plot with WGLMakie I get
```Error: error handling request
│   exception =
│    All field types need to be isbits. Found: Attributes with (Dict{Symbol, Observable},)```
Is this expected?

text: You can only pass the axis keyword when creating an axis with scatter, not plot into an existing axis with scatter!

oh, ok
In this case how can I set the aspect ratio?
